title: Jordan Peterson Discovers God #1, Natural Law and the Search a New, not Novel Order
description:
Tom Holland had a tweet advertising the upcoming World Cup of Ancient gods on his "The Rest is History" podcast. I'm excited. But it will prompt in crunchy believers a pause. What are we to do with these "gods"? Are they today's Super Heroes? What were they? 

This opens the door to the much asked for clarification of God #1 and God #2. I'm regularly asked for a fuller explanation of these two terms. Am I a polytheist? Do they map onto the Christian Trinity? 

They have always been bins on my theological work bench to try to make sense of what has happened in the West, and to try to figure out why @Jordan B Peterson has been a more effective evangelist than many Christians including myself. I wrote a Substack laying some of this out. https://paulvanderklay.substack.com/p/finally-some-clarity-on-god-1-and

Jordan Peterson's God (God #1) triggers a lot of "Natural Law" enthusiasts in the American religions and non-church-going conservative ecosystem which prompted Bionic Mosquito to drop me a note. Bionic Mosquito wrote me a helpful email asking about my hesitant engagement with "Natural Law". I don't have a problem with what the phrase "Natural Law" wishes to signify, but I think the term is embedded in a way that doesn't work. https://bionicmosquito.blogspot.com/2020/08/natural-law-sola-scriptura.html

I recently heard on a video from @Andrea with the Bangs in an interview with Richard Rohlin what I thought was a good treatment of "Natural Law", and how it plays in the world, along with an emerging Orthodox new languaging.  https://youtu.be/SpQhBBOzUcM

Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/2MdXZC5x

Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

My Substack https://paulvanderklay.substack.com/

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

All Amazon links here are part of the Amazon Affiliate Program. Amazon pays a small commission at no additional cost to you if you buy through one of the product links here. 

https://paypal.me/paulvanderklay

To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin (BTC): 37TSN79RXewX8Js7CDMDRzvgMrFftutbPo 
To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin Cash (BCH) qr3amdmj3n2u83eqefsdft9vatnj9na0dqlzhnx80h 
To support this channel/podcast with Ethereum (ETH): 0xd3F649C3403a4789466c246F32430036DADf6c62

Powerpoints of Monologue videos are available for Patrons at https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://odysee.com/@paulvanderklay

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

To support Paul's work by supporting his church give here. https://tithe.ly/give?c=2160640
